sentence.Network_en: When you work for a jerkwater TV station like this, you learn to do everything.
sentence.Network_cn: 当你为如此小规模的电视台工作时, 你得学会什么都干.

PerfectNetExp.abs: jerkiness 急动jerkwater 微小的jerky 急拉的

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from jerk + water, from the need for early railway engines to be supplied with water in remote areas, by dipping a bucket into a stream and ‘jerking’ it out by rope

sentences.sentence: "passed a series of poky little one-horse towns"

auth_sentence.content: A little jerkwater town back in South Dakota.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: A little jerkwater town back in South Dakota.

auth_sentence.content: Trades in the inane, jerkwater Mets cap for a garish helmet festooned with live serpents.
